CustomField.description: indicates if a response is active in the funnel or not.
CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Non Opt-In (Illegal)" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Existing Opportunity" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unable to Connect" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "On Hold" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Customer" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Opportunity Lost" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Disqualified" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - No Action Required" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Existing Opportunity" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Merged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Already Engaged" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Deleted" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Lost" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Resolved - Opportunity Won" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Unmapped" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Legacy" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Default" ), ISPICKVAL(FCRM__FCR_Response_Status__c, "Not a Response")),"Not Active in Funnel" , IF( FCRM__FCR_SQR__c = TRUE, "OPP", IF( CFCR_SCL__c = TRUE, "SCL", IF( FCRM__FCR_SAR__c = TRUE, "SAL", IF( FCRM__FCR_QR__c = TRUE, "HQL", IF( FCRM__FCR_Inquiry_Target__c = TRUE, "Inquiry", "UNDEFINED") )))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: indicates if a response is active in the funnel or not.
CustomField.label: Current Stage in Funnel
